name: Roll and Catch (Reif_Afro_Dude)
description: Hi  my name is Sharriff Chaplin I'm student at Fitchburg State University  and my game is called Roll and Catch the object of the is to roll to the squares and get them before the enemy get you their are power up that will have them bounce away but only for limited time it a one shot one hit kill once that it the game is over. I would like to thank the guys and gals for helped me with this assets their names are Toby Fredson and Catalin Pavel, Ibrahim Falith I got their assets from Free assets store in Unity please check them out you will not be  disappointed. This is my first solo game any comments criticism it all good  bro.
